meanings.definition: The state or quality of being endomorphic.
meanings.sent1: Her endomorphy made her well-suited for sumo wrestling.
meanings.sent2: The doctor explained that his endomorphy was due to genetics.
meanings.sent3: Despite his endomorphy, he was surprisingly agile on the dance floor.
meanings.sent4: Her endomorphy was like a cozy blanket, comforting and warm.
meanings.sent5: The endomorphy of the teddy bear made it perfect for cuddling.

meanings.definition: The tendency to have a body type characterized by a predominance of soft roundness.
meanings.sent1: His endomorphy made him look like a friendly teddy bear.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her endomorphy and felt confident in her own skin.
meanings.sent3: The endomorphy of the puppy made everyone want to pet him.
meanings.sent4: The endomorphy of the clouds in the sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The endomorphy of the pillow made it perfect for a nap.
